func:
var BODArray=[]
BODArray.push(14000)
BODArray.push(20000)
msg.payload=BODArray

return msg;

var CODArray=[]
CODArray.push(24000)
CODArray.push(130000)

return msg;

name: Set data
func:
var now = new Date();

msg.payload = {
    "timestamp" : now.getTime(),
    "Year": now.getFullYear(),
    "Month" : now.getMonth(),
    "Day" : now.getDay(),
    "Hour" : now.getHours(),
    "Minute" : now.getMinutes(),
    "Second" : now.getSeconds(),
    "Inlet Flow" : global.get('InletFlow'),
    "Lift Tank Level" : global.get('LiftTankLevel'),
    "Equalization Tank Level" : global.get('EqualTankLevel'),
    "Equalization Tank Volume" : global.get('EqualTankVolume'),
    "Equalization Tank pH" : global.get('EqualTankpH'),
    "DO in Biological Tank" : global.get('DissolvedOxygen')
}
return msg;

msg.payload = global.get('SulfuricAcid2ConsumptionVar2') + global.get('SulfuricAcid2ConsumptionVar1') + global.get('PhosphoricAcid1ConsumptionVar2') + global.get('PhosphoricAcid2ConsumptionVar2') + global.get('Urea1ConsumptionVar2') + global.get('Urea2ConsumptionVar2') + global.get('CausticSoda1ConsumptionVar2') + global.get('CausticSoda2ConsumptionVar2');
return msg;
